name: Prime Cut
description:
A game made with Löve.

Prime cut is a game about collecting materials from creatures by using your sword.

Merely killing the creatures will not cut it, you have to make sure the part you intend to collect is left intact. If it breaks, you get nothing!

You use the materials to unlock stages and more creatures to encounter. There's a total of two stages, with 8 different creatures. Don't let the number fool you though some of them are clones with very little differences.

Thank you for giving it a chance!
